title: Riftwalk rewards
body: Does anyone know when Riot will be distributing them since

replies.body: I don't have any specific details on when rewards will roll out, but if you sit tight and keep an eye on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) or the [eSports page](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US), you should be set.
